item.title: Lava
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:22, topic:137291”]He followed a tut I’m sure, and it called for Splatter brushing, and as usual he overdid the brushing. Exe was right, it was way too bright, it looks a lot better after he fixed it. I still can’t say it’s the best, but you’re getting better each time you make a sig. If I were you I’d look for some Render Blending tuts, and some brushing tuts. You need to learn to use the brushing as a way to enhance the render, and bring the viewers attention to the Render. and not these large globs of color all over the sig, it’s too distracting. To be honest, I don’t even remember seeing text on it, if there was I couldn’t see it.

EDIT: I see, you did another overlay, that shit is getting annoying man, I think you need to also look at text effect tutorials too.[/quote]
me following a tut? go shoot your self, i dont even really use tuts, i just read them for ideas, if you really want me to make a tut for this i will. this is simples clipping masks and and photo effects, tbh, I DID NOT USE A TUTORAIL

Read full topic

item.title: Lava
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

He followed a tut I’m sure, and it called for Splatter brushing, and as usual he overdid the brushing. Exe was right, it was way too bright, it looks a lot better after he fixed it. I still can’t say it’s the best, but you’re getting better each time you make a sig. If I were you I’d look for some Render Blending tuts, and some brushing tuts. You need to learn to use the brushing as a way to enhance the render, and bring the viewers attention to the Render. and not these large globs of color all over the sig, it’s too distracting. To be honest, I don’t even remember seeing text on it, if there was I couldn’t see it.

EDIT: I see, you did another overlay, that shit is getting annoying man, I think you need to also look at text effect tutorials too.

Read full topic
